Message:
“If you’re going to die anyway,
why not give your life over to me?”

Some strange girl asked me
that out of the blue one day.

Her question made her
seem very rude.
Then again,
it’s not like my life was
precious to me at this point.

So, as I pulled the sword
out of my heart, I answered.
“Sure.”

The sword left a hole in my
chest that slowly began to heal.

The girl grinned as she watched
it all unfold before her very eyes.

Just who is this person?
What a creep...

That was my first
impression of her.

Even now,
I still don’t know her name,

but what I do know is
what she was called.

This dreadful witch,
who could destroy the world
with the touch of her fingertip,

smiled at me as gleefully
as a child.
